loan.name: Deogracious
loan.use: to buy manure to improve his banana plantation yields.
loan.description:
Deogracious is a married man age 64 from Rwampara in Western Uganda. He has six children and two of his children are school-going. Deogracious is a farmer of bananas and coffee. He is a repeat borrower with EBO SACCO and his credit behavior with the Institution has been extremely good.

Deogracious has applied for a loan from EBO SACCO to buy manure to improve his banana plantation. He hopes to improve his harvests, and this will help increase his income to sustain his family.
loan.whySpecial: It helps increase the productivity and income of rural farmers in Uganda.
